definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Traces of plutnonium were detected in samples taken on March 21 and 22.
sentences.chinese: 在21日和22日的土壤監測中，發現微量鈈元素。

sentences.english: Two old plutonium disposal plants damaged at once by some unestablished reason.
sentences.chinese: 兩個舊鈈處理廠遭到不明原因受到損壞。

sentences.english: Mixed oxide fuel rods are partly made of plutonium. These fuel rods are partly exposed.
sentences.chinese: 混合氧化物燃料棒含鈈，這些燃料棒已經部分暴露。

sentences.english: In your collaborations, always remember that "credit" is not a conserved quantity.
sentences.chinese: 再合作鍾，腰牢記榮譽鈈湜壹戈守恆得量。

sentences.english: I have handled Uranium the size of a hazelnut.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經拿過一塊榛子那麼大的鈈。

sentences.english: It is unclear if the plutonium-production reactor at Plant 821 has operated recently.
sentences.chinese: 821工廠的生產鈈的反應堆最近不知道有沒有工作。

sentences.english: Japan has large stockpiles of plutonium for its nuclear-energy industry.
sentences.chinese: 日本擁有大量用於核能工業的鈈儲備。

sentences.english: The job isn't hinging on whether you choose to be a spruce versus an oak.
sentences.chinese: 工作得關鍵鈈再於妳選擇叻雲杉而鈈湜橡樹。

sentences.english: The job isn't hinging on whether you choose to be a spruce versus an oak.
sentences.chinese: 工作得關鍵鈈再於妳選擇叻雲杉而鈈湜橡樹。

sentences.english: Fissile materials used in nuclear bomb production include highly enriched uranium and plutonium.
sentences.chinese: 用於製造核彈的裂變材料包括高濃縮鈾和鈈。

sentences.english: Earlier this month it said it had produced more weapons-grade plutonium.
sentences.chinese: 本月早期，朝鮮稱它生產了更多的武器級鈈。

sentences.english: MOX is a blend of plutonium and reprocessed uranium, which Japan wants to use to generate power for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 該物質中含鈈和再加工過的鈾，日本將首次用它發電。

sentences.english: How how much i love you. do you know?
sentences.chinese: 已經，離鈈鐦你勒，知道麼？

sentences.english: Government survey found that radioactive plutonium spread to the village restaurant the first time.
sentences.chinese: 政府調查中發現放射性鈈擴散至飯館村尚屬首次。

sentences.english: Written on the face does not matter, mouth talking do not care, in fact, was very concerned about.
sentences.chinese: 臉仩寫著無所謂，嘴仩詤著鈈茬乎，其實惢裏很茬意。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "keum"), an ancient Korean writing system
